overview.value: This lesson will cover the basics of JavaScript programming language.

objective.value: Understand the basics of JavaScript syntax
Learn how to declare variables and use different data types
Define and call functions in JavaScript
Use if/else statements to control program flow

activities.title: Variables and Data Types
activities.description: Learn how to declare variables and use different data types in JavaScript.

activities.title: Functions
activities.description: Learn how to define and call functions in JavaScript.

activities.title: Conditional Statements
activities.description: Learn how to use if/else statements to control program flow in JavaScript.
